scripts.back-merge: git fetch && git checkout master && git merge && git checkout release && git merge && git merge master && git push && git checkout develop && git merge && git merge release && git push
scripts.changelog: git checkout release && git pull && lerna-changelog
scripts.imtr:postprocess: cd packages/client; prettier src/topics.json public/**/transformed/*.json public/**/list.json --write
scripts.imtr:preflight:
echo 'Check if deno version is 1.6...
' && command -v deno && deno --version | grep 'deno 1.6'
scripts.imtr:transform: deno run --unstable --allow-write --allow-read --allow-run -c ./packages/imtr/tsconfig.json ./packages/imtr/src/main.ts transform --dir=packages/client && npm run imtr:postprocess
scripts.imtr: npm run imtr:preflight && npm run imtr:install && npm run imtr:fetch && npm run imtr:transform
scripts.prepare-release:
npm i && npm run back-merge && git checkout develop && npm run imtr && echo '

Please commit your changes, then push your changed and then run "npm run release".
'
scripts.publish: git checkout release && git pull && lerna publish
scripts.release: git checkout release && git pull && cli-confirm "Are you sure you want to merge develop into release? (yN)" && git merge origin/develop && git push
